text: Jules Gildas Youmeni Deugoue (born 29 June 1998) is a Cameroonian footballer who plays for Denmark Series club Ringkøbing IF. ==Career== === Orlando City B === Youmeni signed with United Soccer League side Orlando City B on 9 February 2017. He made his professional debut on 15 April 2017 against New York Red Bulls II.http://www.uslsoccer.com/newyorkredbullsii-orlandocityb-905479 ===CD Sariñena=== On 5 November 2019, Youmeni signed with Spanish club CD Sariñena who play in Segunda División B, the third-division of Spanish soccer. ===Roskilde=== At the end of July 2019 it was confirmed, that Youmeni had joined Danish 1st Division club FC Roskilde.Transfers: Cameroonian defender Jules Gildas joins FC Roskilde, kick442.com, 27 July 2019 However, the deal wasn't confirmed before the 3 September 2019, where he got his work permit and could sign a two-year deal.FC Roskilde får arbejdstilladelse til 21-årig, bold.dk, 3 September 2019 He made his debut for the club on the same day in the Danish Cup. On 10 January 2020 it was confirmed, that he had left the club after making only the one cup appearance.En hel hær søger væk fra FC Roskilde, bold.dk, 10 January 2020 ===Ringkøbing=== On 24 January 2020, Youmeni signed a six-month contract with Ringkøbing IF in the Danish 2nd Division. Following his move, he stated that he looked forward to develop as a player and help save the club from relegation. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:Cameroonian expatriate footballers Category:Orlando City B players Category:CD Sariñena players Category:FC Roskilde players Category:Ringkøbing IF players Category:USL Championship players Category:Tercera División players Category:Association football defenders Category:Cameroonian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Cameroonian expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Cameroonian expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark Category:Montverde Academy alumni
title: Jules Youmeni
